string.value: #p2040013# apparently has been skipping lunch these days because of heavy workload... I better check it out.

#p2040013# complained to me that he had been missing lunch lately because of the #o3210205#s that were all over Eos Tower. The angered #p2040013# wanted me to kill #b20 #o3210205#s#k and bring him #b5 #t4000096#s#k.

#i4000096##t4000096# #b#c4000096#/5#k
#o3210205# #r#a32441##k

I was able to help out #p2040013#, who had been missing lunch almost everyday because of the #o3210205#s invading Eos Tower, by killing off those #o3210205#s and giving him some walnuts in the process.
아~ 정말 배고프다. 오늘도 도시락은 도착하지 않는건가? 너무 배고파서 꼬르륵 소리가 더 크게 들리는 것 같아. 나는 여기서 하루종일 열심히 일하지만 거의 매일 점심을 먹지 못하고 있어요.
왜 그러냐구요? 그거야 당연히 저 밉살스러운 #o3110102#떼 때문이죠. 특히 #b#o3210205##k는 덩치가 크고 식탐이 많아서 #m220000000#으로부터 배달오는 내 점심 도시락을 매번 훔쳐먹는다구요. 더 이상은 못 참겠어요. 저를 도와주시지 않겠어요?
매일 저의 도시락을 뻇어 먹는 밉살스러운 #b#o3210205# 20마리#k를 잡고, 배고픔을 달랠 수 있게 #b#t4000096# 5개#k를 가져다 주세요. 온 몸에 힘이 없어서 더 이상 일을 할 수가 없어요.
그럼 전 오늘도 쫄쫄 굶으면서 일을 할 수 밖에 없겠네요... 아~ 배고프다.
Ahhh~ I'm starving. No lunchbox for me again? I am so hungry that I am sure people can hear my stomach growl from miles away. I work hard here everyday, but I almost always miss lunch these days...

Why so? Of course that's because of that detestable #o3110102#. I especially can't stand #b#o3210205##k, the big boy that's perpetually hungry and always stealing my lunchbox delivered from #m220000000#! I can't take this anymore. Can you please help me?

I want you to kill those annoying #b#o3210205#s. 20 of them#k. Also, to relieve some hunger, can you please get me #b5 #t4000096#s#k? I am so exhausted from lack of food that I don't think I can work anymore for today.
In that case, I'll have to keep working here, while starving like no other. Arrrrgh, I'm hungry!
Wow! Thank you so much! You were able to kill off all those #o3210205#s! And those walnuts!! Great job!!
Thanks to your help, I was able to fill up my belly for a bit with those walnuts. Thank you so much! Hopefully my lunchbox gets here safely tomorrow!
I... am... starving. Did you kill all #b20 #o3210205#s#k? What about the #b5 #t4000096#s#k that I asked for?
I... am... starving. Did you kill all #b20 #o3210205#s#k? What about the #b5 #t4000096#s#k that I asked for?
